book.publisher: Random House Books for Young Readers
book.synopsis: The classic novel--and hit Broadway show--about escaped convict Jean Valjean has been adapted with easy-to-read text, large type, and short chapters. This engaging adaptation of the timeless tale is ideal for reluctant readers and kids not yet ready to tackle the original.
book.dimensions: Height: 7.63 Inches, Length: 5.25 Inches, Weight: 0.21164377152 Pounds, Width: 0.32 Inches
